page.title: 20POPULATION
page.content:
Only one person out of the 72 did not use the shops at all.We feel the shops are vitally important to our village We asked some people how long they had lived in Thornton.less than 5 years-20,less than 20 years-20,over 20 years -28.The older people have lived here all their lives,but now there is a new group who have moved to Thornton to live in the new houses.We did a traffic survey for four hours cars-266,bikes-36,vans-46, buss-5,people-126,lorrys-11,.We think that the traffic is not unusual but that number of pedestrians shows it to be a very lively village.
.
